title: Build your own Chatbot with Python
description: In this tutorial, I will show you how to build your very own chatbot using Python. There are broadly two variants of chatbots, Rule-based and Self-learning. A rule-based bot uses some rules on which it is trained, while a self-learning bot uses some machine-learning-based approach to chat.In this tutorial, I will show you how to create a simple and quick chatbot in python using a rule-based approach.
